attributes.action: bring back the nit nurse in schools
attributes.additional_details:
One of the biggest worries in a parents mind when thier child starts school is head lice. Such small things that cause chaos. Most parents, will search thier childs hair regular, but how long have they had them by the time you find them and how many children have they passed them to already?
BRING BACK THE NIT NURSE!
No child with lice should be in school, they should be sent home to prevent them from spreading!
Lets see that wonderful nurse back in our schools!

rejection.details: Please see: Bring back Nit Nurse's in School's
